pr_title: Merge support for unknown item count to master

timeline.message:
Support undefined size for DataCommunicator (#8534)

Part of vaadin/vaadin-grid-flow#966
Part of #8189

Add HasDataView interface (#8559)

Added the HasDataView interface so that for cases that are not handled by ListDataView or LazyDataView there can still be a return type of DataView.

Part of #8189

Add an AbstractLazyDataView (#8578)

* Add a AbstractLazyDataView

Removes the public API for data communicator. Adds unit tests for undefined
size APIs for data communicator, except for default page increase since
that is likely to still change.

* Add missing tests, small fixes

* Fix review issues

Refactor lazy data view API based on feedback (#8624)

* Refactor to LazyDataView API based on feedback

Instead of defined/undefined size, uses setRowCountUnknown and
setRowCountEstimate etc. Removed callback for estimate.

* Fixes based on DX test feedback

* Review fixes
Remove unnecessary things for merge to master
